ApproxsimClient.proj
Class UPSConversion

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.proj.UPSConversion

public class UPSConversion
extends Object

This class converts geodetic values (longitude, latitude) into UPS coordinates and vice versa.

UPSConversion

Method Detail

convertGeodeticToUPS

public static UPSCoordinate convertGeodeticToUPS(double longitude,
                                                 double latitude)
This method converts geodetic (latitude and longitude) coordinates to UPS (hemisphere, easting, and northing) coordinates, according to the current ellipsoid parameters.

Parameters:
latitude - latitude in radians.
longitude - longitude in radians.
Returns:
UPS coordinate.

convertUPSToGeodetic

public static double[] convertUPSToGeodetic(UPSCoordinate upsc)
This method converts ups (hemisphere, easting, and northing) coordinates to geodetic (latitude and longitude) coordinates according to the current ellipsoid parameters.

Parameters:
upsc - UPS coordinate.
Returns:
[longitude, latitude] in radians.
